links.title: Negative Expectations, but..
links.description: The U.S. stock market indexes gained 0.1-0.2% on Friday, as the investors hesitated following Thursday's rebound off support level. The S&P 500 index extended its week-long consolidation. It currently trades 5.3% below the January's 26th record high of 2,872.87.

messages.body: $AAPL The mobile payments platform was recently introduced in Poland. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-pay-winning-international-users/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Pay Winning International Users
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) recently rolled out Apple Pay in Poland, and the mobile payments platform has quickly gained traction in the market. In fact, it looks to be on pace to quickly surpass a rival platform that was introduced in the country two years ago. 9to5 Mac has the details on Apple's latest success.

links.title: 100+ Secret Dialer Codes for Your iPhone
links.description: The dialer screen on your iPhone has a lot more to it than just entering phone numbers and hitting the green call button. It's not very obvious, but there are actually secret codes that you can enter into the dialer to find out information about your device, help troubleshoot issues, and mask outgoing calls, just to name a few.

links.title: China Cuts Tariffs for Five Asian Countries - China Briefing News
links.description: By Dorcas Wong China has adopted conventional tariff rates on a range of imported goods originating from India, South Korea, Bangladesh, Laos, and Sri Lanka, following a recent announcement from the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council. Beginning July 1, 2018, tariffs on a total of 8,549 goods were reduced or cut to zero.
